alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 3:15PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Scattered to numerous snow showers, some heavy with a few embedded squalls, will impact portions of southwestern Franklin, southeastern St. Lawrence and northwestern Essex Counties through 400 PM EST... At 310 PM EST, snow showers were along a line extending from near Carry Falls Reservoir to near Cranberry Lake to 12 miles southwest of Oswegatchie. Movement was east-southeast at 35 to 40 mph. HAZARD...Heavy snow, blowing snow and wind gusts of 25 mph or greater. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility will pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Tupper Lake, Adirondack Regional Airport, Saranac Lake, Piercefield, Wawbeek, Horseshoe Lake, Cranberry Lake, Star Lake, Harrietstown, Paul Smiths, Conifer, Saranac Inn, Gabriels, Lake Clear, Upper Saint Regis, St. Regis Mountain, Gale, Childwold, Shurtleff and Upper St. Regis.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Essex
